import { Button } from '@material-ui/core'; import React , { Fragment, useState }from 'react'; import "../css/CreateMatch.css" import Alert from '../layout/Alert'; class CreateMatch extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { name: "Hapoel Patch Tikva", anotherTeam: "", gameDate: "" } this.check = this.check.bind(this); } componentDidMount() { const newDate = new Date().toDateString(); alert(newDate); this.setState({gameDate: newDate }) } insertDeitals(name,value) { this.setState({ [name] : value}); } check() { alert(this.state.anotherTeam) } render() { const gameDate = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); return ( <>

Create Match - {gameDate}

); } }; export default CreateMatch;
